Package Lubomski_WGU_C195.helper

Class Time

java.lang.Object
Lubomski_WGU_C195.helper.Time
public class Time extends Object
Provides Time methods for date and time.

      endDateTime - The end date-time to check.
      Returns:

    • parseUTCDateTimeForUpdate

      public static LocalDateTime parseUTCDateTimeForUpdate(String dateTimeStr)
      Parses a date-time string from UTC to the local time zone. This method interprets the provided date-time string as a UTC time and converts it to the local time zone of the system.
      Parameters:
      dateTimeStr - The UTC date-time string to be parsed.
      Returns:
      A LocalDateTime object parsed date-time in the local time zone, or null if parsing fails.
      Throws:
      DateTimeParseException - if the text cannot be parsed or the format is incorrect.
